CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironclad Ventures relative to Starlight Innovations?
SRP.A: Ironclad Ventures is {below} Starlight Innovations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aegis Corp relative to Starlight Innovations?
SRP.A: Aegis Corp is {below} Starlight Innovations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starlight Innovations relative to NovaTech Solutions?
SRP.A: Starlight Innovations is {above} NovaTech Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total market share?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironclad Ventures}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total market share?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starlight Innovations}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is NovaTech Solutions's minimum Market Share in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: NovaTech Solutions's minimum Market Share is in {1961}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aegis Corp's minimum Market Share in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aegis Corp's minimum Market Share is in {1960}.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1963, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1962 and 1963?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1960 and 1963 was {larger} than between 1962 and 1963.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1969, was the average total Market Share higher or lower than between 1975 and 1976?
NC.A: The average total market share between 1967 and 1969 was {lower} than between 1975 and 1976.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1972, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1977?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1961 and 1972 was {smaller} than between 1970 and 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1969, was the average total Market Share higher or lower than between 1961 and 1974?
NC.A: The average total market share between 1960 and 1969 was {lower} than between 1961 and 1974.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Vanguard Dynamics} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did NovaTech Solutions and Aegis Corp first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: NovaTech Solutions and Aegis Corp first exchanged leading positions in {1961}.
